message.body: Hey so I ended up just putting off the paper did you ever find the movie
Nope. I have also put off the paper...fuuuuuck
:'( let's skip class from now on and never go back
No seriously let's do that
Haha I'd love that....
What format is it supposed to be in.??? I've never written a college paper
Yeah I have no idea actually.
I'm gonna start my paper tonight but watch the movie tomorrow let me know if you want to come over and watch with me. Do you have any idea what you're gonna do for your presentation aspect of it
Yeah I'd love to watch it with you. Ermmmmmm probably about whether or not the directors interpretation of Jesus is offensive
But are you just gonna talk? Or have like some sort of presentation ready? Okay cool sounds good
Oh god should I have some kind of presentation ready????
I'm thinking no but I have no clue! 4 of us did the same movie...I don't even know how much there is to say :p
Did you get her email??? Yay!!!!!!
Presenting in groups!!!
Also have you been able to access the required readings? I can't....
Last thing...did you do mla or Chicago or what?
Yayyyyy for groups!! There are required readings??? And Mla because its easier and I can just tell her that's what I'm used to probably
Okay I'll do mla probably. Should we ask? Yeah well readings that you have to mention in your essay
Also which criticism did you use? Ideological theological or (probably not) mythological
Ideological
Yeah that's what I did also
I typed two sentences...then I decided to watch Futuramap
Futurama*
Does a page count as a fifth page if only 2/3 of the page is full
Hahaha mmm...yes.
I think once I get started it'll be okay but I can't write an intro to this :p it's bullshit ahhhh school
Maybe type out all your thoughts and then arrange them into an essay. That's what I did and it made it a lot easier
Perhaps I should do that, yeah. Thanks! What're you gonna do about the required articles? You might be able to see them online with your moms account but I can't get to them ahhh
Would you mind?
I was able to get only one so that's the only one I'm going to reference in my paper. Do you want me to take screenshots of it?
I feel like I should find a way to reference the other ones but fuck it I'm done with this paper and I don't want to try anymore
Haha yeah I feel like we should use both:/ since they're like the only two requirements :p haha
But idk how...I can't get them online at all. I guess going to the library is an option but am I lazy:p
Thanks so much. If I do end up going I'll send you it
just don't do it. And yeah I'll send them in a couple of minutes
Haha it's fine thanks a ton
I still haven't written a page....:
Just sent them in an email
I don't know if they're in the right order........woooooops
Just finished the movie. So bad. Okay so my criticism of it is like a page or a little do you think that's ok? Haha since that's easier to write than academic things
Yeah def
Can you videotape Girls playing in your computer with your phone and then send me the video
That's how desperate I am
I'm gonna email you a link on Facebook hold on
Okay sent it
If it doesn't work you can just use my Comcast log in haha
Haha oh I thought you meant you just wanted to watch the most recent one! Wait you haven't seen the first season?? Ahh!! Well both seasons are on there
I want to use this but I haven't even watched the first season
Ahhhh I see now I see! Okay lemme check if it works
:) it should...violet and I use it a lot (for other shows)
